sub_title: Programme Manager and Trainer at The Hague Academy for Local Governance
summary:
Koen is an experienced programme manager and training facilitator. His main strenghts are proven intercultural communication skills, sense of responsibility and his drive to get results. 

In the past years, he managed programmes in a.o. Afghanistan, Albania, Iraq, the Netherlands, Uganda, Ukraine and South Sudan. 

In his current capacity, Koen coordinates a team of programme managers and contributes to strategic decisions in international partnerships.
